description: Try our easy to follow Coffee & Hazelnut Biscotti recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coffee & Hazelnut Biscotti Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180° C. Place hazelnuts on a baking tray and roast for 10 minutes. Transfer to a clean tea towel and rub vigorously to remove skins. Return to tray and bake for 5-10 minutes until golden. Transfer to a bowl.
Place plain flour, raw caster sugar, espresso style and baking powder in a food processor and process to combine.
Add chopped butter and process until mixture resembles breadcrumbs. Add eggs and vanilla extract. Process until a ball forms.
Turn onto a floured surface. Add hazelnuts and knead in. Divide dough in half and shape each into a 20cm log. Transfer to a lined tray. Bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and cool for 20 minutes.
Reduce oven to 160°C. Cut logs into 1cm-thick slices. Transfer to tray. Bake for 30 minutes. Cool. Serve with coffee.
